start_text:
👋 Hi! I'm a bot for finding teams and clubs in Brawl Stars.
Press "Start" to learn about all my features. 🔮
subscription_required:
❗️ You need to subscribe to our channel to use this bot.

Please subscribe to {channel_link} and press the "Check Subscription" button
error_checking_subscription: ❌ An error occurred while checking your subscription. Please try again later.
normal_search_advice_text:
💡 Tip:
If you notice any rule violations, press "⚠️ Report". Thanks!
no_announcements: 📝 No announcements sent. Send a photo to create one:
report_text: ⬆️ What is the violation in this announcement?
premium_text:
😎 Be the best with Premium subscription and its cool features!

⭐️ Early access to new features – test them first.

📲 Video and GIF in announcements – attract more teammates!

🔥 Two active announcements – search for two teams or two clubs at once.

🏆 Premium badge – stand out among other players.
error_invalid_recipient: ❌ Invalid ID. Please enter a numeric recipient ID.
error_invalid_amount: ❌ Please enter a numeric value for the number of coins.
error_insufficient_crystals: ❌ Error: not enough coins. Your balance: {crystals}.
no_announcement_create_prompt: 📄 You have no announcement yet. Send a photo to create one.
ann_send_photo:
📲 Send a photo, video, or GIF to create an announcement
(Video and GIF for premium users only):
ann_media_invalid: ❌ Please send a photo, or video/GIF (if you have premium).
ann_desc_short: 😉 Description must be at least 20 characters
ann_preview: 🔍 Here's how your announcement will look:
ann_created_success: ✅ Your announcement has been created and is now searchable!
gift_time_error: ⌛️ You've already claimed your gift today. Come back tomorrow at 00:00!
ann_select_keyword: 🔑 Select a keyword for your announcement:
not_your_announcement: ❌ This is not your announcement or it doesn't exist
daily_crystals_received:
✅ You received {amount} coins!
Come back tomorrow for a new reward!
daily_crystals_already:
⏳ You've already received your daily coins.
Come back tomorrow!
rules_text:
Advertising ❌

External links ❌

Profanity ❌

18+ Content ❌

⚠️ Click 'Report' if someone's announcement violates our rules
